general.name: spFluxcalib
general.description: Contains the calibration vectors for a given frame

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: eBOSS
surveys.description: A cosmological survey of quasars and galaxies to understand baryon acoustic oscillations

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description: Image with the flux calibration vector for each fiber.

header.comment: Primary Header created by MWRFITS v1.13

hdu1.description: Binary table with traceset structure of b-spline fits for calibration vectors. This is a compact version of the information in the primary HDU.

header.comment: Binary table written by MWRFITS v1.13

NORD.name: NORD
NORD.description: Number of orders for Bspline fit

hdu2.description: Binary table with information about the standard stars used to construct the calibration vector.

header.comment: Binary table written by MWRFITS v1.13

LINECHI2.name: LINECHI2
LINECHI2.description: CHi-square of fit near absorption lines

LINEDOF.name: LINEDOF
LINEDOF.description: degrees of freedom of fit near absorption lines

MRATIO.name: MRATIO
MRATIO.description: MRATIO vectors are the "raw" flux-calib vectors for each expos+CCD

hdu3.description: Binary table with traceset structure of b-spline fits for calibration vectors of all standards.

header.comment: Binary table written by MWRFITS v1.13

NORD.name: NORD
NORD.description: Number of orders for Bspline fit

header.comment: Binary table written by MWRFITS v1.13

THISMRATIO.name: THISMRATIO
THISMRATIO.description: MRATIO vectors are the "raw" flux-calib vectors for this expos+CCD

THISFLATARR.name: THISFLATARR
THISFLATARR.description: polynomial fit of the object with respect to the model

FRAC_SCAT.name: FRAC_SCAT
FRAC_SCAT.description: percental dispersion of the fluxing vectors used wrt the truth

THISFLATARR_ALL.name: THISFLATARR_ALL
THISFLATARR_ALL.description: rpolynomial fit of the object with respect to the model for all star

THISFLATARR_NEW.name: THISFLATARR_NEW
THISFLATARR_NEW.description: polynomial fit of the object with respect to the model for all the std and all obj
